column2: Autobot ${username}. In the calm of your absence
column3: let our bond remain unbroken. Until our paths intertwine again
remember that our connection transcends physical presence. Goodbye

column2: Autobot ${username}. In the ebb and flow of our journey
column3: let the equilibrium of our companionship guide your path. Farewell!
may you find balance and harmony in your endeavors. Goodbye
column4: and may our connection remain strong.

column1: In the vast expanse of possibilities
column3: may our connection endure beyond the moments we part. Goodbye
